column5: Last minute cancellation has resulted in today (June 28) through Saturday (July 1) becoming available. Three nights for $1,000.00 plus fees and taxes.   July 4th and 5th still available and price was reduced June 18th! See below for details. 3 Days / 2 nights, $710.00.  New, ultra luxury, super high tech beach home with huge 1600 square foot full wraparound deck.   See YouTube for overview of the property including aerial video by searching The Lone Palm Resort, Crystal Beach, Texas
column8: New Luxury Home w/ Great View. 110 steps to beach.
